recipes.name: Classic Pancakes
recipes.description: A simple recipe for light and fluffy pancakes, perfect for breakfast.
instructions: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg, and melted butter; mix until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat.
Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Brown on both sides and serve hot.

recipes.name: Simple Tomato Soup
recipes.description: A comforting and easy-to-make tomato soup from canned tomatoes.
instructions: In a large pot or Dutch oven, melt butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and cook until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
Pour in the crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Carefully transfer the soup to a blender and puree until smooth. You can also use an immersion blender directly in the pot.
Return the soup to the pot. If using, stir in the heavy cream. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Heat through but do not boil. Serve hot.
